mission.title: Mission, Vision &
mission.subtitle: Discover what drives us to empower the next generation of East African musical talent
mission.missionText: At SimpoPlanet Music Label, our mission is to discover and empower new musical talent across Rwanda and East Africa. We are dedicated to promoting upcoming singers and music producers by providing them with access to professional recording, production, and promotional opportunities through Simpo Studio.
mission.visionText: Our vision is to be a leading music label in East Africa, known for nurturing and promoting the next generation of musical talent. We aim to create a vibrant community of artists who can express themselves freely and reach audiences worldwide through our commitment to quality and innovation.
mission.valuesSubtitle: The fundamental principles that guide our decisions and shape our culture
mission.innovationDesc: Pushing creative boundaries in music production
mission.passionDesc: Genuine love for music and artist development
mission.unityDesc: Building bridges through African musical heritage
mission.excellenceDesc: Commitment to the highest quality standards
mission.ctaTitle: Ready to Be Part of Our Mission?
mission.ctaText: Join us in shaping the future of East African music. Whether you're an artist, producer, or music enthusiast, there's a place for you in our community.

about.title: Shaping the Future of
about.subtitle: Discover how we're revolutionizing the music industry in Rwanda and beyond
about.description1: SimpoPlanet is a dynamic music label based in East Africa, Rwanda, with a mission to discover, nurture, and promote emerging talent in the music industry. Through our state-of-the-art Simpo Studio, we provide a creative space where new singers and music producers can grow, express themselves, and share their voices with the world.
about.description2: At SimpoPlanet, we believe in the power of music to inspire and connect people. We are committed to supporting the next generation of artists by offering them professional guidance, high-quality production, and the exposure they need to reach a wider audience.

features.communityDesc: Supporting local talent and cultural expression

about.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Musical Journey?
about.ctaText: Join us on our journey to shape the future of musicâ€”one artist at a time. Let's create something amazing together.

founder.title: The Visionary Behind
founder.name: Simpo Savior
founder.quote: Music is the weapon against injustice and the bridge for African unity.
founder.description1: Simpo Savior is a Rwandan reggae artist and outspoken Pan-Africanist whose music is a powerful blend of rhythm, resistance, and reflection. Known for his deep lyrics and soulful sound, Simpo uses his voice as a weapon against injustice and a bridge for African unity.
founder.description2: Rooted in the spirit of reggae legends but uniquely shaped by his East African heritage, Simpo Savior stands as one of the voices of conscious music in Rwanda and beyond. His groundbreaking debut album "Africa, Why Do Your Profits Go Abroad?" established him as not only a musician but also a messenger.

achievements.pioneerDesc: Leading voice in East African reggae music
achievements.panAfricanistDesc: Advocate for African unity and consciousness

pr.name: Ladouce
pr.biography: Ladouce is a seasoned PR professional with over 8 years of experience in the music industry. She has successfully managed publicity campaigns for numerous artists, helping them build their brand and connect with their audience. Her expertise includes media relations, brand strategy, social media management, and crisis communication. Ladouce's passion for music and her strategic approach have made her an invaluable asset to artists looking to elevate their public presence.

hero.title: Simpo Planet
hero.description: Discovering and nurturing exceptional talent across East Africa. Where creativity meets opportunity in the heart of Rwanda's music scene.
